title: Disputing other parts of the claim
captionHeading: Respond to a property possession claim
introParagraph: You should <link>view the claim (opens in new tab)</link> to see if there’s any other parts of the claim that are incorrect or you disagree with.
includesList: {{claimantName, pluralPossessive}} grounds for possession (their reasons for making the claim)
